true.prompt: The doctor calls you to let you know that you have a rare genome in your blood. The doctors offers you 500k to do tests
outcomes: Congrats ! You were just scammed ! The 18-year old doctor from Florida has reappeared after getting off from his 2017 fraud charges. You were his first victim. Your blood is VERY regular.
You continue with your monthly plasma donations

false.prompt: You are the only person who has never caught Covid
outcomes: As you were leaping, you leaped into a pile of money. Its your lucky day.
You go on tour in your 60s and tell children at the library how you dodged Covid.You continue to take your vitamins and never catch the infamous bug.
